projectDescription.title: Project Description
projectDescription.content: This interactive visualization analyzes and visualizes the topics and speakers of the Freak Show Podcast over the years. Using AI-powered text analysis and clustering algorithms, topics are grouped and their temporal development is displayed in river diagrams.
